summary:
### **Material Information Summary**  

#### **Capital Raising Announcement**  
- **Type:** Institutional Placement  
- **Amount Raised:** AUD 60 million  
- **Issue Price:** AUD 0.15 per share  
  - 4.1% discount to 20-day VWAP  
  - 10.3% discount to 10-day VWAP  
- **Use of Proceeds:**  
  - Expand open pit mining (third mining fleet)  
  - Accelerate growth drilling (open pit & underground)  
  - Confirm processing expansion pathway (beyond 600ktpa)  
- **Timetable:**  
  - **Settlement Date:** 24 June 2025  
  - **Allotment Date:** 25 June 2025  
- **Post-Placement Capital Structure:**  
  - **Ordinary Shares Outstanding:** 2,915,705,170  
  - **Unlisted Options & Performance Rights:** Various expiries/strikes  

### **Additional Material Context (from announcement commentary)**  
- **Upcoming Milestone:** First gold pour expected June 2025 (Murchison Gold Project).  
- **Existing Project Metrics (from December 2024 DFS):**  
  - 1.2Moz @ 3g/t Au Resource  
  - 10-year production plan, avg. 65kozpa (first 7 years).  

**Omitted:** Management commentary, legal disclaimers, background project details, broker names.
